thread.title_full: Chelsea and Diego Costa yet to agree terms on new contract - Sky sources | Football News | Sky Sports

author: Paul Vinnell
title: Chelsea and Diego Costa yet to agree terms on new contract - Sky sources | Football News | Sky Sports
text:
Chelsea and Diego Costa yet to agree terms on new contract - Sky sources By Paul Vinnell Last Updated: 15/02/17 12:50pm Diego Costa is yet to agree a new deal with Chelsea Chelsea are in advanced talks with Diego Costa, but are yet to agree a new contract, according to Sky sources. 
Media reports on Tuesday suggested that a deal had been struck to keep the Spain international at Stamford Bridge, but Sky sources understand that they are premature. 
Chelsea are making no comment. 
More to follow...
